column4: my package manager isn't showing me all (almost no) apps i search for. can someone help
so, first of all, which package manager is this?
and how are you searching, and what are you searching  for?
in the search bar, vlc, opera, flash etc
and when you search for vlc, what do you see? What do you expect to see?
nothing, i expect to see the vlc package
Again, only thing I could think of is misconfigured filters, it works just as it should on my side here....
so if you just do "apt-cache show vlc", does that show the package info alright?
it show me info....allot of it
Yea, so then it's just the search in synaptic that's wonko...
any idea how to fix it
have not seen the issue before, not a clue, search launchpad if there are any bugs on the issue.
the ubuntu bug tracker at launchpad.net
